docstring.long_description:
Inputs
------
default : OrderedPair|Vector
    Input that defines the x-axis values of the function and output.
docstring.short_description: Generate a waveform with a given shape (sine, sawtooth, etc).

parameters.name: waveform
parameters.description: The waveform type of the wave.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The y axis offset of the function.

parameters.name: phase
parameters.description: The x axis offset of the function.

returns.description:
x: the input v or x values
y: the resulting sine function
